verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim Now these [are] the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim, and the Levites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עָל֛וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu that went up עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with זְרֻבָּבֶ֥ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel with Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵ֖ל <S%H7597><s%> she-'al-ti-'El of Shealtiel וְיֵשׁ֑וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ve-ye-Shu-a'; and Jeshua שְׂרָיָ֥ה <S%H8304><s%> se-ra-Yah Seraiah יִרְמְיָ֖ה <S%H3414><s%> yir-me-Yah Jeremiah עֶזְרָֽא׃ <S%H5830><s%> 'ez-Ra. Ezra
אֲמַרְיָ֥ה <S%H568><s%> 'a-mar-Yah Amariah מַלּ֖וּךְ <S%H4409><s%> mal-Luch Malluch חַטּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H2407><s%> chat-Tush. Hattush
שְׁכַנְיָ֥ה <S%H7935><s%> she-chan-Yah Shechaniah רְחֻ֖ם <S%H7348><s%> re-Chum Rehum מְרֵמֹֽת׃ <S%H4822><s%> me-re-Mot. Meremoth
עִדּ֥וֹא <S%H5714><s%> id-Do Iddo גִנְּת֖וֹי <S%H1599><s%> gin-ne-To Ginnetho אֲבִיָּֽה׃ <S%H29><s%> 'a-vi-Yah. Abijah
מִיָּמִ֥ין <S%H4326><s%> mi-ya-Min Miamin מַֽעַדְיָ֖ה <S%H4573><s%> ma-'ad-Yah Maadiah בִּלְגָּֽה׃ <S%H1083><s%> bil-Gah. Bilgah
שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H8098><s%> she-ma'-Yah Shemaiah וְיוֹיָרִ֖יב <S%H3114><s%> ve-yo-ya-Riv and Joiarib יְדַֽעְיָֽה׃ <S%H3048><s%> ye-Da'-Yah. Jedaiah

סַלּ֣וּ <S%H5543><s%> sal-Lu Sallu עָמ֔וֹק <S%H5987><s%> a-Mok, Amok חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah Hilkiah יְדַֽעְיָ֑ה <S%H3048><s%> ye-da'-Yah; Jedaiah אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֧י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei These [were] the chief הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim of the priests וַאֲחֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem and of their brethren בִּימֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days יֵשֽׁוּעַ׃ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a'. of Jeshua פ Peh

וְהַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> ve-hal-vi-Yim, Moreover the Levites יֵשׁ֧וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' Jeshua בִּנּ֛וּי <S%H1131><s%> bin-Nui Binnui קַדְמִיאֵ֥ל <S%H6934><s%> kad-mi-'El Kadmiel שֵׁרֵבְיָ֖ה <S%H8274><s%> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah יְהוּדָ֣ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah מַתַּנְיָ֑ה <S%H4983><s%> mat-tan-Yah; [and] Mattaniah עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- charge הֻיְּד֖וֹת <S%H1960><s%> h-ye-Dot [which was] over the thanksgiving ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וְאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav he and his brethren

וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֨ה <S%H1229><s%> u-vak-buk-Yah Also Bakbukiah; וְעֻנֹּו ve-'un-nov כוְעֻנִּ֧י <S%H6042><s%> ve-'un-Ni Unni קאֲחֵיהֶ֛ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chei-Hem their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֖ם <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Dam opposite לְמִשְׁמָרֽוֹת׃ <S%H4931><s%> le-mish-ma-Rot. [were] over against them in the watches

וְיֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ve-ye-Shu-a' And Jeshua הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יֽוֹיָקִ֑ים <S%H3113><s%> yo-ya-Kim; Joiakim וְיֽוֹיָקִים֙ <S%H3113><s%> ve-yo-ya-Kim Joiakim הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid also begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶלְיָשִׁ֔יב <S%H475><s%> 'el-ya-Shiv, Eliashib וְאֶלְיָשִׁ֖יב <S%H475><s%> ve-'el-ya-Shiv and Eliashib אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹיָדָֽע׃ <S%H3111><s%> yo-ya-Da'. Joiada

וְיוֹיָדָע֙ <S%H3111><s%> ve-yo-ya-Da' And Joiada הוֹלִ֣יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan, Jonathan וְיוֹנָתָ֖ן <S%H3129><s%> ve-yo-na-Tan and Jonathan הוֹלִ֥יד <S%H3205><s%> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יַדּֽוּעַ׃ <S%H3037><s%> yad-Du-a'. Jaddua

וּבִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-vi-Mei And in the days יֽוֹיָקִ֔ים <S%H3113><s%> yo-ya-Kim, of Joiakim הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu become כֹהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> cho-ha-Nim were priests רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the chief הָאָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot; of the fathers לִשְׂרָיָ֣ה <S%H8304><s%> lis-ra-Yah of Seraiah מְרָיָ֔ה <S%H4811><s%> me-ra-Yah, Meraiah לְיִרְמְיָ֖ה <S%H3414><s%> le-yir-me-Yah of Jeremiah חֲנַנְיָֽה׃ <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah. Hananiah
לְעֶזְרָ֣א <S%H5830><s%> le-'ez-Ra Of Ezra מְשֻׁלָּ֔ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam, Meshullam לַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> la-'a-mar-Yah of Amariah יְהוֹחָנָֽן׃ <S%H3076><s%> ye-ho-cha-Nan. Jehohanan

לִמְלוּכִי lim-lu-chi כלִמְלִ֙יכוּ֙ <S%H4409><s%> lim-Li-chu Malluch קיֽוֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3129><s%> yo-na-Tan, Jonathan לִשְׁבַנְיָ֖ה <S%H7645><s%> lish-van-Yah of Shebaniah יוֹסֵֽף׃ <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef. Joseph
לְחָרִ֣ם <S%H2766><s%> le-cha-Rim Of Harim עַדְנָ֔א <S%H5733><s%> 'ad-Na, Adna לִמְרָי֖וֹת <S%H4812><s%> lim-ra-Yot of Meraioth חֶלְקָֽי׃ <S%H2517><s%> chel-Kai. Helkai

לַעֲדָיָא la-'a-da-ya כלְעִדֹּ֥וא <S%H5714><s%> le-'id-Do Iddo קזְכַרְיָ֖ה <S%H2148><s%> ze-char-Yah Zechariah לְגִנְּת֥וֹן <S%H1599><s%> le-gin-ne-Ton of Ginnethon מְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam. Meshullam

לַאֲבִיָּ֖ה <S%H29><s%> la-'a-vi-Yah Of Abijah זִכְרִ֑י <S%H2147><s%> zich-Ri; Zichri לְמִ֨נְיָמִ֔ין <S%H4509><s%> le-Min-ya-Min, of Miniamin לְמוֹעַדְיָ֖ה <S%H4153><s%> le-mo-'ad-Yah of Moadiah פִּלְטָֽי׃ <S%H6408><s%> pil-Tai. Piltai
לְבִלְגָּ֣ה <S%H1083><s%> le-vil-Gah Of Bilgah שַׁמּ֔וּעַ <S%H8051><s%> sham-Mu-a', Shammua לִֽשְׁמַעְיָ֖ה <S%H8098><s%> lish-ma'-Yah of Shemaiah יְהוֹנָתָֽן׃ <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan. Jehonathan
וּלְיוֹיָרִ֣יב <S%H3114><s%> u-le-yo-ya-Riv And of Joiarib מַתְּנַ֔י <S%H4982><s%> mat-te-Nai, Mattenai לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> li-da'-Yah of Jedaiah עֻזִּֽי׃ <S%H5813><s%> 'uz-Zi. Uzzi
לְסַלַּ֥י <S%H5543><s%> le-sal-Lai Of Sallai קַלָּ֖י <S%H7040><s%> kal-Lai Kallai לְעָמ֥וֹק <S%H5987><s%> le-'a-Mok of Amok עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver. Eber

לְחִלְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2518><s%> le-chil-ki-Yah Of Hilkiah חֲשַׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah, Hashabiah לִֽידַֽעְיָ֖ה <S%H3048><s%> li-da'-Yah of Jedaiah נְתַנְאֵֽל׃ <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El. Nethaneel

הַלְוִיִּם֩ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim The Levites בִּימֵ֨י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei in the days אֶלְיָשִׁ֜יב <S%H475><s%> 'el-ya-Shiv of Eliashib יוֹיָדָ֤ע <S%H3111><s%> yo-ya-Da' Joiada וְיוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3110><s%> ve-yo-cha-Nan and Johanan וְיַדּ֔וּעַ <S%H3037><s%> ve-yad-Du-a', and Jaddua כְּתוּבִ֖ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim [were] recorded רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei chief אָב֑וֹת <S%H1><s%> a-Vot; of the fathers וְהַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> ve-hak-Ko-ha-Nim, also the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in מַלְכ֖וּת <S%H4438><s%> mal-Chut to the reign דָּרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַפָּֽרְסִֽי׃ <S%H6542><s%> hap-Pa-re-Si. the Persian פ Peh

בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons לֵוִי֙ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi of Levi רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei the chief הָֽאָב֔וֹת <S%H1><s%> ha-'a-Vot, of the fathers כְּתוּבִ֕ים <S%H3789><s%> ke-tu-Vim [were] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in סֵ֖פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer in the book דִּבְרֵ֣י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei of the chronicles הַיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> hai-ya-Mim; even until the days וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- up יְמֵ֖י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei to the days יֽוֹחָנָ֥ן <S%H3110><s%> yo-cha-Nan of Johanan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶלְיָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H475><s%> 'el-ya-Shiv. of Eliashib

וְרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> ve-ra-Shei And the chief הַ֠לְוִיִּם <S%H3881><s%> Hal-vi-yim of the Levites חֲשַׁבְיָ֨ה <S%H2811><s%> cha-shav-Yah Hashabiah שֵֽׁרֵבְיָ֜ה <S%H8274><s%> she-re-ve-Yah Sherebiah וְיֵשׁ֤וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ve-ye-Shu-a' and Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son קַדְמִיאֵל֙ <S%H6934><s%> kad-mi-'El of Kadmiel וַאֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> va-'a-chei-Hem with their brethren לְנֶגְדָּ֔ם <S%H5048><s%> le-neg-Dam, opposite לְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> le-hal-Lel over against them to praise לְהוֹד֔וֹת <S%H3034><s%> le-ho-Dot, [and] to give thanks בְּמִצְוַ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> be-mitz-Vat according to the commandment דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- the man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God מִשְׁמָ֖ר <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar ward לְעֻמַּ֥ת <S%H5980><s%> le-'um-Mat over against מִשְׁמָֽר׃ <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar. ward

מַתַּנְיָ֧ה <S%H4983><s%> mat-tan-Yah Mattaniah וּבַקְבֻּֽקְיָ֛ה <S%H1229><s%> u-vak-buk-Yah and Bakbukiah עֹבַדְיָ֥ה <S%H5662><s%> 'oad-Yah Obadiah מְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam Meshullam טַלְמ֣וֹן <S%H2929><s%> tal-Mon Talmon עַקּ֑וּב <S%H6126><s%> 'ak-Kuv; Akkub שֹׁמְרִ֤ים <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rim keeping שֽׁוֹעֲרִים֙ <S%H7778><s%> sho-'a-Rim [were] porters מִשְׁמָ֔ר <S%H4929><s%> mish-Mar, the ward בַּאֲסֻפֵּ֖י <S%H624><s%> ba-'a-sup-Pei at the thresholds הַשְּׁעָרִֽים׃ <S%H8179><s%> hash-she-'a-Rim. of the gates

אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בִּימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> bi-Mei These [were] in the days יוֹיָקִ֥ים <S%H3113><s%> yo-ya-Kim of Joiakim בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יֵשׁ֖וּעַ <S%H3442><s%> ye-Shu-a' of Jeshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יוֹצָדָ֑ק <S%H3136><s%> yo-tza-Dak; of Jozadak וּבִימֵי֙ <S%H3117><s%> u-vi-Mei and in the days נְחֶמְיָ֣ה <S%H5166><s%> ne-chem-Yah of Nehemiah הַפֶּחָ֔ה <S%H6346><s%> hap-pe-Chah, the governor וְעֶזְרָ֥א <S%H5830><s%> ve-'ez-Ra and of Ezra הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest הַסּוֹפֵֽר׃ <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer. the scribe פ Peh

וּבַחֲנֻכַּ֞ת <S%H2598><s%> u-va-cha-nuk-Kat And at the dedication חוֹמַ֣ת <S%H2346><s%> cho-Mat of the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem בִּקְשׁ֤וּ <S%H1245><s%> bik-Shu they sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַלְוִיִּם֙ <S%H3881><s%> hal-vi-Yim the Levites מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol all מְק֣וֹמֹתָ֔ם <S%H4725><s%> me-Ko-mo-Tam, out of all their places לַהֲבִיאָ֖ם <S%H935><s%> la-ha-vi-'Am to bring לִֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> li-ru-sha-Lim; them to Jerusalem לַעֲשֹׂ֨ת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to keep חֲנֻכָּ֤ה <S%H2598><s%> cha-nuk-Kah the dedication וְשִׂמְחָה֙ <S%H8057><s%> ve-sim-Chah with gladness וּבְתוֹד֣וֹת <S%H8426><s%> u-ve-to-Dot both with thanksgivings וּבְשִׁ֔יר <S%H7892><s%> u-ve-Shir, and with singing מְצִלְתַּ֖יִם <S%H4700><s%> me-tzil-Ta-yim [with] cymbals נְבָלִ֥ים <S%H5035><s%> ne-va-Lim psalteries וּבְכִנֹּרֽוֹת׃ <S%H3658><s%> u-ve-chin-no-Rot. and with harps

וַיֵּאָ֣סְפ֔וּ <S%H622><s%> vai-ye-'A-se-Fu, gathered themselves together בְּנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei And the sons הַמְשֹׁרְרִ֑ים <S%H7891><s%> ham-sho-re-Rim; of the singers וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- from הַכִּכָּר֙ <S%H3603><s%> hak-kik-Kar both out of the plain country סְבִיב֣וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot round about יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> u-min- and from חַצְרֵ֖י <S%H2691><s%> chatz-Rei and from the villages נְטֹפָתִֽי׃ <S%H5200><s%> ne-to-fa-Ti. of Netophathi

וּמִבֵּית֙ <S%H1004><s%> u-mib-Beit Also from the house הַגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> hag-gil-Gal, Gilgal וּמִשְּׂד֥וֹת <S%H7704><s%> u-mis-se-Dot and out of the fields גֶּ֖בַע <S%H1387><s%> Ge-va' of Geba וְעַזְמָ֑וֶת <S%H5820><s%> ve-'az-Ma-vet; and Azmaveth כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki themselves חֲצֵרִ֗ים <S%H2691><s%> cha-tze-Rim, them villages בָּנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nu had builded לָהֶם֙ <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem for הַמְשֹׁ֣רֲרִ֔ים <S%H7891><s%> ham-Sho-ra-Rim, for the singers סְבִיב֖וֹת <S%H5439><s%> se-vi-Vot round about יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem
